# Wiki: Design Documents

This directory contains architectural and design documentation.

## Purpose
Store design decisions, architecture diagrams, and system documentation that guide implementation.

## Example Contents
- System architecture docs
- Component designs
- Data models
- Sequence diagrams

## Template

```markdown
# Design: [Feature Name]

## Overview
[Brief description]

## Architecture
[System design]

## Components
[Main components and their responsibilities]

## Data Flow
[How data moves through the system]

## Decisions
[Key design decisions and rationale]
```

## Tips
- Keep designs up to date as implementation evolves
- Link to related requirements
- Include diagrams when helpful
